content:
the president can write to congress anytime they want saying that they want to transfer power to the vice president

if the president cannot transfer power, the vice president and a majority of the cabinet writes on behalf of the president to the speaker of the house and senate pro tempore explaining that the president cannot discharge the duties for the power transfer and then power is transferred

additionally, the president may resume responsibilities when the disability no longer exists ie they automatically become president once they are good
	problem: If the VP is the acting president and the president comes back to work but the vice president contests the position of president, congress can vote on if the president is still suited for the job.
	2/3rds approval and he's gone crab
